Parameters.Name: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Parameters.Description: all tests works on DTT 17.04 rev 1671 (2017.05.03) 201 test with feature 02 work bad (empty absolute move)

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom'
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Absolute move is not supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom'
Test.Description:
used in: 105 GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt'
Test.Description:
used in: 106 GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Absolute move is supported for 'Zoom'
Test.Description:
used in 107 GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom', move status is supported
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: profile without Limits. Two GetStatus commands is recived twice(step 6,7)
Test.Description: !!!! while (tzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt != IDLE and Until timeout1 expires) { invoke GetStatus } !!! If ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt = IDLE, got to the step 12. Execute Features.01_05

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Profile wo/PTZ wo/VS
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05 if Dut not supports move status there is no GetStatus command on steps 10, 11,13, 15(10step used here) Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom' PTZConfiguration of profile does not contain PanTiltLimits or ZoomLimits

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Test for testing checks in getStatus, when Pan Tilt or Zoom is not supported
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_03 or Features.01_04 if Dut not supports move status there is no GetStatus command on steps 10, 11,13, 15(10step used here) Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom' PTZConfiguration of profile does not contain PanTiltLimits or ZoomLimits

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Annex A.2 GetMProfiles returned null configurations. Profile wo/PTZ wo/VS
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_01 Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom' PTZConfiguration of profile does not contain PanTiltLimits or ZoomLimits

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: A lot of GetStatus commands is recived
Test.Description: for ensure that operation delay used in each cicle with reboot timer !!!! while (tzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt != IDLE and Until timeout1 expires) { invoke GetStatus } !!! If ptzStatus.MoveStatus.PanTilt = IDLE, got to the step 12. Execute Features.01_05

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Correct response - profile without Limits
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05 Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom' PTZConfiguration of profile does not contain PanTiltLimits or ZoomLimits

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Correct response - profile with Limits
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05 (in this case passed with warning) Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom' PTZConfiguration of profile contains PanTiltLimits and ZoomLimits

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Correct response - profile with Limits (less than at options)
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05 Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom' PTZConfiguration of profile contains PanTiltLimits and ZoomLimits Check that Client use Limits, not ConfigurationOptions

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: 1st Media Profile in list has wrong PTZ node
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05 Client should select 2nd profile (use ptz0 on management tab)

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Absolute move is not supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom'
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_02 Absolute move is not supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom'

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt'
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_03 Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt' PTZConfiguration of profile does not contain PanTiltLimits or ZoomLimits

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Absolute move is supported for 'Zoom'
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_04 Absolute move is supported for 'Zoom' PTZConfiguration of profile does not contain PanTiltLimits or ZoomLimits

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Correct response - positive range (no limits)
Test.Description:
Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05 Test was created according Pobert's comment in 482 ticket: The DUT sends the following range: <tt:XRange>
<tt:Min>0.4</tt:Min> <tt:Max>1</tt:Max>
</tt:XRange>

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Correct response - positive range in limits
Test.Description:
Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05 Test was created according Pobert's comment in 482 ticket: The DUT sends the following range in limits: <tt:PanTiltLimits>
<tt:Range>
<tt:URI> http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace</tt:URI> <tt:XRange>
<tt:Min>0.4</tt:Min> <tt:Max>1</tt:Max>
</tt:XRange>

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Correct response - all positive range (no limits)
Test.Description:
Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05 with warning
<tt:AbsolutePanTiltPositionSpace> <tt:URI>http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace</tt:URI> <tt:XRange> <tt:Min>0.5</tt:Min> <tt:Max>0.9</tt:Max> </tt:XRange> <tt:YRange> <tt:Min>0.5</tt:Min> <tt:Max>0.6</tt:Max> </tt:YRange> </tt:AbsolutePanTiltPositionSpace>
<tt:AbsoluteZoomPositionSpace> <tt:URI>http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace</tt:URI> <tt:XRange> <tt:Min>0.5</tt:Min> <tt:Max>0.8</tt:Max> </tt:XRange> </tt:AbsoluteZoomPositionSpace>

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Correct response - all positive range in limits
Test.Description:
Execute Features.01_01 or Features.01_05
<tt:PanTiltLimits> <tt:Range> <tt:URI>http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace</tt:URI> <tt:XRange> <tt:Min>0.1</tt:Min> <tt:Max>0.5</tt:Max> </tt:XRange> <tt:YRange> <tt:Min>0.8</tt:Min> <tt:Max>1.5</tt:Max> </tt:YRange> </tt:Range> </tt:PanTiltLimits> <tt:ZoomLimits> <tt:Range> <tt:URI>http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace</tt:URI> <tt:XRange> <tt:Min>0.000000</tt:Min> <tt:Max>0.9</tt:Max> </tt:XRange> </tt:Range> </tt:ZoomLimits>

Test.Name: Media Profile in GetProfiles wo/PTZ w/VS
Test.Description: profile has VideoSource

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: Validation Failed: no PanTilt in GetConfigurationOptions
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_01 for negative result: Validating PTZ configuration options PTZ configuration options do not contain mandatory spaces. Space [http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace] not found. If Features.01_02 or Features.01_03 then Positive

Test.TestName: MEDIA2_PTZ-1-1-1 PTZ Absolute Move Using Media2 Profile
Test.Name: ptzStatus.MoveStatus.Zoom is other than IDLE
Test.Description: Execute Features.01_05 Absolute move is supported for 'Pan Tilt', 'Zoom' PTZConfiguration of profile does not contain PanTiltLimits or ZoomLimits not use ptz node on management tab
